chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (cA_1 m k z) = top m k z

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
top_bottom_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
top_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (A m k z) = top m k z
top_top_2 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z
top_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> top m k (A_1 m k z) = top m k z
top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z
top_top_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z
exd_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (cA m k z) /\ exd m (cA_1 m k z)
cA_1_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z
exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA_1 m k z)
cA_1_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)
cA_1_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA_1 m k z = top m k z
top_top_bottom_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y
bottom_bottom_top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = top m k y
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
cA_1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
not_exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> top m k z = nil
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
pred_exd_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m (A_1 m k z)
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_top_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
pred_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k x -> top m k x <> A_1 m k x
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z
eqc_cA_1_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k x)
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z)
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z
A_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> A m k (A_1 m k z) = z
exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA m k z)
not_succ_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k (top m k z)
not_pred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ pred m k (bottom m k z)
eqc_eqc_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k y)
cA_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z
inv_hmap_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> inv_hmap (B m k z)
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
cA_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)

``` 
intros m k z H1 H2. unfold top. destruct H2. 
- eapply top_A. apply H1. apply H2. 
- eapply top_top_2. apply H1. apply H2.
